title.rendered: The State of Early Talent Recruiting: How Employers, Students & Higher Ed are Responding to COVID-19

content.rendered:
Join us to learn:

  • Results of Handshake’s recent research and survey of student sentiments
  • Insight on student engagement from leaders in university career services
  • How employers are shifting to an all-digital recruiting strategy

View more career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: This webinar will feature a panel of experts from university career services and campus recruitment to discuss trends, student needs and sentiments, recent Handshake data, and what each side requires in this new landscape.
